snippet.title: Official Trailer for Plants vs. Zombies™ 2: It's About Time!
snippet.description:
The first official trailer for Plants vs. Zombies™ 2: It's About Time! The awesome sequel to the hit game Plants vs. Zombies will be released summer 2013, exclusively for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch on the App Store.

More videos including gameplay coming soon!
